Role.description: The role of the survey participant in the context of the presentation

YearsOfExperience.description: The number of years the participant has experience in AI/ML

Industry.description: The industry in which the participant works

AIKnowledgeLevel.description: The participant's self-assessed level of knowledge in AI

UsedAzureAI.description: Indicates whether the participant has used Azure AI before

TopicEngagement.description: Rating for how engaging the topic was

ConceptClarity.description: Rating for the clarity of the concepts presented

DemoUsefulness.description: Rating for the usefulness of the demos

SkillLevelAppropriateness.description: Rating for whether the skill level was appropriate

LearningOutcome.description: Rating for how much the participant learned

RecommendScore.description: The likelihood of the participant recommending the session, rated from 0 to 10

BestPart.description: The part of the presentation the participant liked the most

FutureTopics.description: Topics the participant would like to see in future presentations
